testcase.name: User Sign Up Negative - Invalid Name
testcase.system-out: Given the user clicks on "Masuk"............................................passed When the user clicks on "Daftar di sini"....................................passed And the user enters their full name empty, email address and password QJblfja5Cso=.passed And the user clicks on "Daftar".............................................passed Then the user is still on the sign-up page..................................passed

testcase.name: User Sign Up Negative - Invalid E-mail
testcase.system-out: When the user enters their full name John Smith, invalid email address and password QJblfja5Cso=.passed And the user clicks on "Daftar".............................................passed Then the user is still on the sign-up page..................................passed

testcase.name: User Sign Up Negative - Invalid Password
testcase.system-out: When the user enters their full name John Smith, email address and empty password.passed And the user clicks on "Daftar".............................................passed Then the user is still on the sign-up page..................................passed

testcase.name: User Sign Up Negative - Already Registered E-mail
testcase.system-out: When the user enters their full name John Smith, already registered email address QAE10_GR03_buyer@binar.com and password QJblfja5Cso=.passed And the user clicks on "Daftar".............................................passed Then the error message "Email has already been taken" is displayed..........passed And the user is still on the sign-up page...................................passed

testcase.name: User Sign Up Positive
testcase.system-out: When the user enters their full name John Smith, unique email address and password QJblfja5Cso=.passed And the user clicks on "Daftar".............................................passed Then the user is redirected to the homepage.................................passed And the user clicks on "Profil Saya"........................................passed Then the user's name John is displayed......................................passed
